descriptionHtml:
[center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/594/wotlklogoedited.jpg/][IMG]http://img594.imageshack.us/img594/4507/wotlklogoedited.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/center]
[font=\"Tahoma\"][center]This project aims to bring Arthas\' face, gear and some other goodies into Skyrim with as much authenticity as possible. I will upload my own work and list all mods related - the idea is to make this a hub where Arthas freaks quickly and easily can find all mods available on the subject.

If you know of mods that fit the above description, that aren\'t already listed here, please let me know![/center]

[size=\"5\"][b]Currently includes[/b][/size]
- Plate of the Damned WotLK Edition
- Plate of the Damned WC3 Edition
- Armor & cape mesh edits by Faelrin
- Frostmourne WotLK Edition
- Brand spankin\' new normal maps for the entire set

[size=\"5\"][b]Works in progress[/b][/size]
- Glowing Eyes with animated Smoke Trail
- Frostmourne WC3 Edition
- A Black Hood befitting of a Death Knight
- Helm casting a shadow on wearer\'s face
- Jojjo\'s [url=file.php?id=10251]Silverlight[/url] set color variations
- Custom Arthas Face Textures

All feedback is appreciated, and all requests/suggestions will be taken into consideration.

[size=\"5\"][b]Special thanks[/b][/size]
- To Jojjo for creating these gorgeous meshes and textures - none of this would\'ve been possible without him! 
- To Bellyache for showing me the ins and outs of texturing with Photoshop and her continuous support. 
- To Faelrin for her great work on editing Jojjo\'s meshes.

[size=\"5\"][b]Requirements[/b][/size]
[url=file.php?id=6348]Frostmourne and Lich Kings Armor[/url] by Jojjo.

[size=\"5\"][b]Recommended mods related to Arthas[/b][/size]
[url=file.php?id=11020]Frost Wyrm Companion[/url] by Faelrin
[url=file.php?id=9583]Summon Skeletal Horde[/url] by J3X

[size=\"5\"][b]Installation[/b][/size]
First install [url=file.php?id=6348]Jojjo\'s mod[/url]. Then unpack and paste the contents of the Arthas the Lich King\' folder into your game directory. Overwrite files when prompted.[/font]
author: -Mitchhunter -Faelrin -Jojjo
